author: Marios C
title: 4-day group break, close to everything, at a distance from centre of Paris
text:
Despite some negative reviews I have read and the anxiety caused, we found the hotel quite appealing based on its location, room space, price, polite staff, good service and amenities. It was unfortunate that we were given a room with a view to the surrounding business buildings and not the river or the Eiffel Tower, and that's why we didn't spend so much time indoor to care that much. Unfortunately, Paris' weather was very bad, all raining, cloudy and damp.
